speaker: Clown
text_entry: ACT V

speaker: Clown
text_entry: SCENE I. Marseilles. A street.

speaker: Clown
text_entry: Enter HELENA, Widow, and DIANA, with two Attendants

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: But this exceeding posting day and night

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Must wear your spirits low; we cannot help it:

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: But since you have made the days and nights as one,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To wear your gentle limbs in my affairs,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Be bold you do so grow in my requital

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: As nothing can unroot you. In happy time;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Enter a Gentleman

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: This man may help me to his majesty's ear,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: If he would spend his power. God save you, sir.

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: And you.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Sir, I have seen you in the court of France.

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: I have been sometimes there.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I do presume, sir, that you are not fallen

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: From the report that goes upon your goodness;

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: An therefore, goaded with most sharp occasions,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Which lay nice manners by, I put you to

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: The use of your own virtues, for the which

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I shall continue thankful.

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: What's your will?

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: That it will please you

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To give this poor petition to the king,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: And aid me with that store of power you have

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: To come into his presence.

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: The king's not here.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Not here, sir!

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: Not, indeed:

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: He hence removed last night and with more haste

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: Than is his use.

speaker: Widow
text_entry: Lord, how we lose our pains!

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: ALL'S WELL THAT ENDS WELL yet,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Though time seem so adverse and means unfit.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I do beseech you, whither is he gone?

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: Marry, as I take it, to Rousillon;

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: Whither I am going.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I do beseech you, sir,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Since you are like to see the king before me,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Commend the paper to his gracious hand,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Which I presume shall render you no blame

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: But rather make you thank your pains for it.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: I will come after you with what good speed

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Our means will make us means.

speaker: Gentleman
text_entry: This I'll do for you.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: And you shall find yourself to be well thank'd,

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Whate'er falls more. We must to horse again.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Go, go, provide.

speaker: HELENA
text_entry: Exeunt
